mapper.select: select a.id as id,u.name as owner,a.name as name,a.startDate as startDate,a.endDate as endDate, a.cost as cost,a.description as description,a.createTime as createTime,a.createBy as createBy, a.editTime as editTime,a.editBy as editBy from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where a.id = #{id}
